channel.title: Help Please
channel.description: I looked and looked for a command that you have to do ::pray and it gives you full pray Health. Or whatever its called. Does anyone have that command?

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { maxprayer = playerLevel[5]; refreshSkills(); }

You can choose your command name etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Sure try adding this. if (cmd[0].equals("pray")) { player.getSkills().RestorePray(player.getSkills().getLevelForXp(5)); player.sm("You Restore your prayer!"); }
Note: This is for a 562. You might have to change a few things if your on a different source type.

Read full topic
